Reviews.Title: “Good, but far”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean and practical. The service is good, although the breakfast isn't very varied. The hotel is very good, but is really far from downtown. The transport is bad! The company should invest in a bus to take the clients to downtown. If they do that I will come back!

Reviews.Title: “-”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price. Breakfast should be a little more various, maybe a meat selection wouldn't be that big thing. Really close to the bus stop, approx 5 min walk. Helpful reception team, always able to help whatever you ask for.

HotelInfo.Name: ETAP Madrid Vallecas
HotelInfo.Address: Poligono Industrial Vallecas | C/ Casas de Miravete 17, 28031 Madrid, Spain
